Text:
Let us pray.
Lord Jesus Christ, You are meek with a humble heart. Your yoke is pleasant, and your burden is light for those who follow You. [t] Only you are worthy of our prayers and devotion. [*] Grant us Your peace as we rest, so we might arise ready to serve You, who live and reign forever.
Amen.
Changes: 2024-01-19 - Constance McIntosh Smith: Implemented her editorial feedback.
2024-01-19 - Paul Prins: Reworked to be more stylistically in line with my writing.
